channel.title: Howcome I cant get Godswords and updated weapons? Im a newb at this stuff
channel.description:
I've been editing my server shops and then I came to editing whats in the shops. but I realised then I cant actually get Godswords on it, when I try to ::pickup a godsword I pickup a lil red dot called ....dwarf232@;; null or something like that.
how do I get Godswords/dclaws/bandos etc onto my server?

item.title: Howcome I cant get Godswords and updated weapons? Im a newb at this stuff
item.dc:creator: @X_Val_X X Val X
item.description:
@X_Val_X wrote:

So where can I download Godsword Models ? then where do I add them?

Read full topic

U need models, u can download godsword models. or download a client that works with ur source.

item.title: Howcome I cant get Godswords and updated weapons? Im a newb at this stuff
item.dc:creator: @X_Val_X X Val X
item.description:
@X_Val_X wrote:

Ok sorry but I kinda don’t know what you just said? could you like copy n paste yours to a reply and tell me where to add them? :o
or is it not tht easy.

Read full topic
item.source: Howcome I cant get Godswords and updated weapons? Im a newb at this stuff

item.title: Howcome I cant get Godswords and updated weapons? Im a newb at this stuff
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

You have to get the models for your client, and get the .txt doc for them, and put them in your class8.java in your client.

Then, you take the item id, go into config, item.cfg and put them in.

Read full topic
item.source: Howcome I cant get Godswords and updated weapons? Im a newb at this stuff
